item.description:
Join us to see the great local band of John Cafferty and Beaver Brown from 6:30 to 8:30pm.  Then we can watch the balloons as they slowly rise and glow against the evening sky. Bring your cameras for this popular event. Try to arrive early so we can find good seats.  You may wish to bring your own chair for convenience.

http://www.southcountyballoonfest.com/?/events/view/balloon_glow

$10 admission for balloon festival.

http://www.southcountyballoonfest.com/events
item.how_to_find_us: Across from Tarbox vehicles at right side of stage/cell phone given later

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band at South County Balloon Festival
